page.title: 08MATTESONS SAFETY AT WORK
page.content: Safety is of a great importance. Meetings are held once a month to check and discuss all aspects.This includes vehicles driven around the site,delivery vehicles,and most important preparing the food.They have greatly reduced the number of accidents over the years by the wearing of chain-mail gloves and apron-type garments. This protects the body from serious wounds as they strip meat from the bones.We had a feeling that it was a happy firm. Everyone was friendly and helpful and smiling. Herman Miller is a large modern building covering some 7,500 sq ft. This firm would not have been able to site this factory on the nearby industrial estate.
